name: Garden Defense (ArcAid)
description:
Mousey must save the flowers for his valentine from thirsty flies!

His gun's broken though, making it harder to shoot only the flies.. He doesn't wanna destroy his own plants now, does he? 

Help Mousey impress his girl!

Contols:
WASD - Movement
space - Jump
mouse click - Shoot

Credits:
Programmers/Designers:
Katherine Burnett, James Shipp and ArcAid
Game Art:
Katherine Burnett
